          <title>
            <string language="en">Ester formation: reaction of alcohol and ethanoyl chloride</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Esteranordnung: Reaktion von Spiritus und 
von ethanoyl Chlorverbindung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formation d'ester : réaction d'alcool et de
chlorure d'ethanoyl</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação do ester: reação do álcool e 
do cloreto do ethanoyl</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione dell'estere: reazione di alcool 
e del cloruro di ethanoyl</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός εστέρα: αντίδραση του χλωριδίου 
οινοπνεύματος και ethanoyl</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación del éster: reacción del 
alcohol y del cloruro del ethanoyl</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the reaction of ethanol and ethanoyl chloride to form ethyl ethanoate.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">acyl</string>

          <structure>

            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Reaktion des Äthanols 
und der ethanoyl Chlorverbindung zum Formularäthyl ethanoate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la réaction de 
l'éthanol et du chlorure d'ethanoyl à l'ethanoate d'éthyle de 
forme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a reação do ethanol e 
do cloreto do ethanoyl ao ethanoate do ethyl do formulário.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la reazione di 
etanolo e del cloruro di ethanoyl al ethanoate dell'etile della forma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την αντίδραση του 
χλωριδίου αιθανόλης και ethanoyl για να διαμορφώσει το αιθύλιο 
ethanoate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la reacción del etanol
y del cloruro del ethanoyl al ethanoate del etilo de la forma.</string>
          </description>
